mapper.select: SELECT RID FROM DMU_RESERVATION WHERE RDATE < (SYSDATE - 1) AND RCHECK = 'y'
mapper.update: UPDATE DMU_RESERVATION SET RCHECK = 'ex' WHERE RID = #{rid}
UPDATE DMU_TICKETINFO SET TCHECK = 'ex' WHERE RID = #{rid}
mapper.select: SELECT DT.DID, DR.RID, DT.DTITLE, DT.DTIME, DT.DPLACE, DT.DSFILE, TO_CHAR(DR.ROKDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ROKDATE, DR.RTOTAL, DR.RPRICE, DR.RCHECK, DR.RDATE, DP.PDATE, DP.PALLPRICE, DP.PCOIN, DT.DCODE FROM DMU_TICKET DT, DMU_RESERVATION DR, DMU_PAYINFO DP WHERE DT.DID = DR.DID AND DR.RID = DP.RID AND DR.RID = #{rid}
mapper.update: UPDATE DMU_TICKETINFO SET TCHECK = 'n' WHERE TID = #{tid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DMU_TICKETINFO WHERE RID = #{rid} AND TCHECK = 'n'
mapper.update: UPDATE DMU_RESERVATION SET RCHECK = 'n', RFAILDATE = SYSDATE WHERE RID = #{rid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DMU_INQUIRY VALUES('iq_' || SEQU_DMU_INQUIRY.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{iqcategory}, #{iqtype}, #{iqtitle}, #{iqcontent}, 'n', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DMU_INQUIRY WHERE MID = #{mid}

SELECT RNO, IQID, IQCATEGORY, IQTYPE, IQTITLE, IQANSWER, TO_CHAR(IQDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IQDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNO, IQID, IQCATEGORY, IQTYPE, IQTITLE, IQANSWER, IQDATE FROM (SELECT IQID, IQCATEGORY, IQTYPE, IQTITLE, IQANSWER, IQDATE FROM DMU_INQUIRY WHERE MID = #{mid} ORDER BY IQDATE DESC)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT IQID, IQCATEGORY, IQTYPE, IQTITLE, IQCONTENT, IQANSWER, TO_CHAR(IQDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IQDATE FROM DMU_INQUIRY WHERE IQID = #{iqid}

SELECT MID, CONCAT(SUBSTR(MID, 1, 4), '***') MID_SECURITY, LPAD(' ', 10, '*') PASS, CASE WHEN NATIONALITY = 'local' THEN '내국인' ELSE '외국인' END AS NATIONALITY, CASE WHEN GENDER = 'm' THEN '남자' ELSE '여자' END AS GENDER, REPLACE(MNAME, SUBSTR(MNAME, 2, LENGTH(MNAME)-2), '*') MNAME, TO_CHAR(BIRTH, 'YYYY.MM.') || '**' AS BIRTH, SUBSTR(PNUMBER, 1, 4) || '****' || SUBSTR(PNUMBER, 9, 13) AS PNUMBER, SUBSTR(EMAIL, 1, 4) || '*****' || SUBSTR(EMAIL, INSTR(EMAIL, '@', 1), LENGTH(EMAIL)) AS EMAIL, ADDR1 || ' ' || ADDR2 AS ADDRESS FROM DMU_MEMBER WHERE MID = #{mid}

choose.when: UPDATE DMU_MEMBER SET PASS = #{vo.pass} WHERE MID = #{vo.mid}
UPDATE DMU_MEMBER SET ZONECODE = #{vo.zonecode}, ADDR1 = #{vo.addr1}, ADDR2 = #{vo.addr2} WHERE MID = #{vo.mid}

mapper.update: UPDATE DMU_MEMBER SET UNREGISTER = 'n' WHERE MID = #{mid}
